item.name: Corrupted Mythallar Shard
entries: Once per turn, after a spell of 1st level or higher is cast within 5 feet of the Corrupted Mythallar Shard, roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|phb} table to create a magic effect. If it normally requires concentration, it doesn't require concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.

While attuned to it, whenever you cast a spell of 1st level or higher roll a {@dice d20}. On an even result, your spell is cast one level higher if the spell permits it, otherwise you cast the spell as usual and you must roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|phb} table to create a magic effect.

item.name: Unknown Magic Shard
entries: This jagged shard sheds dim light with dimmer shadows and shapes moving across its surface. Its properties are a mystery, but feint threads of the Weave can be seen for a brief moment when holding the shard and moving it through the air.
